<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Lament](/Spells.aspx?ID=614)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 116 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Sorrow](/Domains.aspx?ID=50)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30-foot cone

**Target** 1 or more creatures
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Saving Throw** [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Will

</row>

</column>

---

You let out your negative emotions in a guttural wail that shakes your enemies’ hearts and deals 1d8 mental damage (basic Will save). If you have any harmful conditions imposed by [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects, _lament_ deals additional mental damage equal to the counteract level of the highest-level effect.

---
**Heightened (+1)** The damage increases by 1d8.
